channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Complete Overview of the EU RoR Job Market"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Complete Overview of the EU RoR Job Market"

item.title: Suggestion from Nikos Dimitrakopoulos (@)
item.description:
Please be so kind to update your proposal in the following two aspects:

  1. Remove your personal details from the description
  2. Don't set the duration of the talk - this is well defined beforehand by the organizers of the event.

Please read and respect the rules and the event in general or we may have to withdraw your proposal without any further notice.
